0.Instructor comments: lazy students, does not understand requirements
0.Course comments: Hard and unclear. He has great insights and really cares about what every single student has to say.

1.Course comments: It took him forever to reply to my emails.

2.Course comments: He never told us what he wanted on the assignments, and no matter what I tried, I kept getting Cs on my assignments.

3.Course comments: This is a challenging course. There is a wide breadth of topics covered in a short period of time; be prepared to work. This is especially challenging if taken in the distance learning environment. It takes discipline to do.

4.Course comments: I really enjoyed this class. I liked the in-class demos/examples to help remember the material. I also liked that one exam was dropped. It was a nice reward for working hard throughout the semester. I would recommend Eric as an instructor to those looking to take this course.

5.Course comments: I thought this class was fantastic. It was definitely my favorite class this semester. I thought the course matter was interesting and Eric was a very good teacher. He was entertaining and engaged and he always communicated things in a clear way. If he did go through things too fast for some people, he would always go back and make sure to clarify any confusion.

6.Instructor comments: always late, half the class is missing
6.Course comments: He is funny and always willing to help. He knows the material inside and out. I learned more in the lab than in the lectures

7.Course comments: I like that he allowed student participates a lot the class. The class is usually directed by the spirit, and based on students questions. He does His best to ensure every student questions are answered.

8.Course comments: Very energetic and passionate about the class. He assigns a few papers and attendance and they are your grade.
